website_summaries.verdict: These classically-styled Ugg boots sport a touch of sweetly feminine style with the addition of two fixed bows on the back seam. That means they look a little dressier than the classic Uggs, so go ahead and wear them with something pretty, or just stick with your tried-and-true Uggs and jeans weekend ensemble.
pros: Lower-calf boots in soft twin-face sheep suede are fully lined in Uggpure sheep fleece and have a soft foam sole
Comfortable arch support, and so cute
Available in 12 colors, including blue, red, and bordeaux
cons: As with all suede Uggs, you'll need to treat these with a water-repelling spray to prevent spots or water damage

customer_reviews.title: Get regular size!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful. But do not listen to anyone who says to get a size smaller as I did and they are too small. I am giving them to my daughter now. I am an 8 , so I got the 7 and yeah they are way too snug! Oh well. They are super cute in th gray!
customer_reviews.author: debra B

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and adorable! They are pricey, but it's high quality leather and genuine sheepskin, so well worth the price. They seem to be a little snug when you first get them (not uncomfortably so, but a bit tight), but keep in mind that the sheepskin interior will compress a little with wear... so you do want them a bit snug to start. I get compliments all the time. SO CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love UGGS and these boots are a pretty color of grey and very comfortable. They are nice and warm in the freezing cold weather... below 0 and my feet are still nice and toasty. They are well made and the bows stay where they are supposed to. These are my second pair of Bailey Bows (different colors) and I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love my UGGs they are so soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love my UGGs they are so soft and comfortable, the only downfall is that my husband spent a little more on these boots through Amazon versus actually going to the outlet store. I actually found this style at Sam’s Club and they were $100 less but in brown! very happy with the UGG boots quality and comfort it’s just of course the the name that you’re paying for.
customer_reviews.author: James Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and SOOO COMFY
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable boots ever. Now i know what the UGG hype is about. They look good too!
customer_reviews.author: G. Nesci

customer_reviews.title: My disappointment in the craftsmanship of the uggs boots.
customer_reviews.text: The left uggs boot was wrinkled on the outside and didn’t lay or hold up flat against my ankle. The right boot was fine...but you could really notice the difference in the two boots.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Anne Butler

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fits well. True UGGS, not a knock off. Quick shipping. Packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyMamaInTheSouth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic warm boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love these boots! I have a couple of tall pairs but, these have quickly become my new favorites! So easy to slip on to dash out to Pilates and other errands.... cool and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Dobie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Huggs for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after trying various UGG styles on in a store. I knew the size I was ordering would fit. The sales lady suggested purchasing UGG's that fit nice and snug at time of trying them on, as they will give a tiny bit. I've wore mine for close to a week, and they still hug my feet perfectly. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: MNgirlinUT

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches so they are a bit snug. I have used a shoe horn to get them on a few times and they seem to be stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these boots I debated for 2 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these boots I debated for 2 weeks weather I wanted to put that big of investment into them. So glad I did they fit wonderful are comfortable and cute. very glad I got the ugg care kit treated them before first wear and so glad I did spilled both on them dabbed with a towel and never left a mark
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Ugg
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - very happy with my purchase! The ribbons are so adorable
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I Love them they look so cute
customer_reviews.text: I Love them they look so cute. If you are in between sizes I recommend to go with the smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Pelush

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE!! Bows are such a cute touch!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Bows on the back are so cute. As UGG's always are, they are super comfy and although they were a bit of a splurge on myself around Christmas time, I'm glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She loves them and says it feels like your walking on pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kaleda

customer_reviews.title: Love the bows.  Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Size 9 front seems a little long but super cute and warm
customer_reviews.author: Holz

customer_reviews.title: What's to say? They're UGG's, they're overpriced, ...
customer_reviews.text: What's to say? They're UGG's, they're overpriced, but it's what the kid wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Freak

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved them for her Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved them for her Christmas gift. Even though we live in Houston, Texas, she will still use them twice a year!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: This product was FAKE!!!’ Not happy... the discription was very misleading..
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: 8 was definitely way too tight and 9 is slightly big but is the better choice for me for sure
customer_reviews.text: My feet are size 9. I ordered 8 and 9; 8 was definitely way too tight and 9 is slightly big but is the better choice for me for sure. It has not stretched too much and my feet are ALWAYS the perfect temperature, which is my favorite thing about these!
customer_reviews.author: swammer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and super comfy. I literally cannot take them off
customer_reviews.text: I got them in grey. Cute and super comfy. I literally cannot take them off. They're pricey but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all nice boots wish there was half sizes
customer_reviews.text: Over all nice boots wish there was half sizes. I am a 8 1/2 so had to order a 9 and are a little large. They are a little stiff hard to drive in, but I'm sure they just need to be broke in. Super super cute love the bows and the color good quality overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them and got so many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: My uggs came kinda damaged my advice for everyone dont buy expensive shoes online go to the real UGG store .
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Santa Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for a 13 year old.....perfect style for her
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Comfy boots. I'm normally a 7. 5 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy boots. I'm normally a 7.5 and got a 6 after trying them on in a store. Definitely size down!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Eagles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are comfortable and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the Baily Bow Uggs
customer_reviews.text: I love the Baily Bow Uggs. I have them in black. I said "No" on arch support because I do not think Uggs are made for arch support, but they are still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TMQ

customer_reviews.title: I'm sending them back same color gray with bows size ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sending them back same color gray with bows size 7. They were sent back today for size 7. Thanks for asking again gray with bows in back only size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Meier

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Bailey Bow II Boot
product_meta.description: Sheepkin lined Classic boot with decorative bows
feature_bullets: Dyed Sheep, Fur Origin: United States/United Kingdom/Spain/Ireland/Australia
Treadlite by UGG outsole for cushion, traction and comfort
Pretreated to repel water and stains
